[vc_row fullwidth=”true” fullwidth_content=”false” el_class=”services-top-text-section services-top-white-bg-section”][vc_column][mk_padding_divider size=”100″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″][mk_fancy_title tag_name=”h3″ size=”36″ font_weight=”600″ margin_bottom=”30″ font_family=”none” responsive_align=”left” el_class=”tj-margin-10″]Maternity Dresses[/mk_fancy_title][vc_column_text el_class=”padding-right-xl-100 padding-right-xs-100″ css=”.vc_custom_1605941476113{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}”]We deal with wide range of bespoke maternity dresses, we have a team of experienced designers, who can help you in getting the desired outfit that you can use during pregnancy and also post pregnancy, even we will provide the free facility of getting it altered, once you want to use as normal kurti. We can provide kurtis gowns, and top also which will give you comfort and also help you in feeding issues.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”cus-book-app” width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1606814398715{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1518720012941{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Book An

Appointment

Upon receiving your booking request, we will contact you within 24 hours to confirm your details and to find a suitable time for your fitting.[/vc_column_text][mk_button dimension=”flat” corner_style=”full_rounded” size=”medium” icon=”mk-li-calendar” icon_anim=”side” url=”https://tailorjunction.com/book-an-appointment/” align=”none” margin_top=”20″ bg_color=”#cfb151″ btn_hover_bg=”rgba(207,177,81,0.8)”]Book An Appointment[/mk_button][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][mk_padding_divider size=”100″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row fullwidth=”true” fullwidth_content=”false” css=”.vc_custom_1603646250074{background-color: #f7f4ef !important;}” el_class=”custom_newsletter”][vc_column][mk_padding_divider size=”60″][mk_fancy_title tag_name=”h3″ size=”36″ font_weight=”600″ margin_bottom=”0″ font_family=”none” responsive_align=”left” el_class=”tj-margin-10″]Signup For Our Newsletter[/mk_fancy_title][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1515965544216{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]Sign up to our newsletter and we’ll keep you up to date with the latest arrivals and offers[/vc_column_text][mk_subscribe button_text=”Subscribe” btn_bg_color=”#cfb151″ input_placeholder_color=”” btn_hover_bg_color=”rgba(207,177,81,0.8)”][mk_padding_divider size=”22″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
